title: A Surge of Blood
description: Alternate cover for this ISBN can be found here“I want to rip the veins out of his body and strangle him with them.”William is no vampire, no matter how obsessed with them he is. William is a worthless, weakling freak (or so people keep telling him). His only friends, Sam and Vincent, are pathetic and unlovable pieces of trash (or so people keep telling them). William has had enough of this school; of these people; of this life. A thirst for revenge is building up inside him. He may not be a vampire, but he will quench this thirst with blood. The years have taught him to hate, and now he will bite.Maybe the strangest novel you will read this year, A Surge of Blood is a powerful, emotionally honest tale of bullying from the perspective of those who have suffered it all their lives. This is a horror thriller that will keep you wanting more.A Surge of Blood is the début novel from UK performance poet Matthew 'Darbs' Derbyshire.
author: Matthew Darbs Derbyshire
